long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🕷️ URL Scraper for Google Search 🔍

🌟 Supercharge Your Web Research! 🚀

Are you tired of manually copying URLs from Google search results? 😓 Say goodbye to tedious copy-pasting and hello to effortless URL harvesting! 🎉 Our URL Scraper for Google Search is here to revolutionize your online research experience! 💪
🎯 What It Does:

This powerful Chrome extension automagically collects URLs from Google search results pages, saving you precious time and energy. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a curious newbie, our tool is designed to make your life easier! 🙌
🔥 Key Features:

⚡ Lightning-Fast Scraping: Collect up to 200+ URLs in seconds!
📚 Multi-Page Magic: Scrape across up to 20+ search result pages automatically
🧹 Clean URLs Option: Remove pesky parameters for squeaky-clean results
📊 Export with Ease: Save your URLs to CSV with just one click
👀 Real-Time Progress: Watch the magic happen with our sleek progress display
🐞 Detailed Debugging: For the tech-savvy, we've got all the info you need

👥 Who Needs This?:

📝 Content Creators: Find sources for your next viral article
🕵️ SEO Wizards: Analyze top-ranking pages in a flash
📣 Marketing Mavens: Build outreach lists at the speed of light
🎓 Students & Researchers: Gather references without breaking a sweat
🦸 Everyday Heroes: Anyone who wants to save time on web research!

🛠️ How It Works:

🔎 Navigate to a Google search results page
🔢 Enter the number of URLs you want (up to 2006)
✅ Optionally, check the box to remove URL parameters
🚀 Hit the "Scrape" button and watch the magic unfold!
📋 Voila! Your URLs are copied to clipboard and ready for export

🔒 Privacy & Security:

🛡️ We respect your privacy: No data is collected or transmitted
🔐 Runs only on Google search pages: Your browsing stays private
👍 Follows all Chrome Web Store guidelines and best practices

💡 Pro Tips:

🎛️ Experiment with different search queries to find the best results
🔄 Use the multi-page feature for more diverse URL collections
📁 Export to CSV for easy organization and sharing

🚀 Ready to Boost Your Productivity?
Don't let manual URL copying slow you down! Install URL Scraper for Google Search now and experience the future of web research. It's time to work smarter, not harder! 💼✨
